alert.note: Alert for City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 3:30PM EDT until April 22 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN YORK ...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE SOUTHERN CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 330 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Christopher Newport University, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Northampton and Beaconsdale around 335 PM EDT. Patrick Henry Field around 340 PM EDT. Hampton, Langley AFB and Tabb around 345 PM EDT. Seaford around 355 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dare, Fox Hill, Langley View, Oyster Point, Messick, Hornsbyville, Hilton Village, Harris Grove, Menchville and Plum Tree Island Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; York
